author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CHANTAL BECOMES POST-TROPICAL... ...FLASH FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES NEAR AND NORTHEAST OF THE CENTER...
summary: ...CHANTAL BECOMES POST-TROPICAL... ...FLASH FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES NEAR AND NORTHEAST OF THE CENTER... As of 11:00 AM EDT Mon Jul 07 the center of Chantal was located near 37.5, -76.3 with movement NE at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...CHANTAL BECOMES POST-TROPICAL... ...FLASH FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES NEAR AND NORTHEAST OF THE CENTER... title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
